Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Creates a biotechnology research and development investment tax credit
Summary: Creates a biotechnology research and development investment tax credit; provides that such credit shall be the product of fifteen percent and the qualified Bio/Med research and development costs paid or incurred in the state; allows credit for the taxable year in which the qualified Bio/Med research and development activity occurs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the creation of a biotechnology research and development investment tax credit
